title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(raster)

census_api_key("6df8ecbbdd76fb9432d628ae6178349765cba241")

v18 <- load_variables(2018, "acs5", cache = TRUE)

View(v18)

ca <- get_acs(geography = "zipcode",
              variables = c(totpop = "B00001_001"),
              state = "CA",
              year = 2018,
              geometry = TRUE)

ca_sp <- sf::as_Spatial(ca)

st_write(ca, "ca.shp", driver="ESRI Shapefile")  # create to a shapefile

raster::shapefile(ca_sp,"test.shp")
```
